member.name: T:Repository.EntityMapping.Entity
member.summary: Represents an entity which can be mapped to the screen objects.

member.name: M:Repository.FieldMap.GetFieldNameFor(System.String,System.Type)

member.name: T:Repository.Sessions.WorkSession
member.summary: Represents white session for test/automation. There should be only one instance of this.
